name: react-ipython-notebook
description: A React component for read-only iPython Notebooks

scripts.notify-lint: output=$(./node_modules/.bin/standard) || (echo "$output"; notif=`echo $output |grep '\/.*:[0-9]*:[0-9]*:' |sed -E -e "s/.*\/([^\/]*\/[^\/]*):([0-9]*):[0-9]*:/\1:\2/g"`; osascript -e 'on run argv' -e 'display notification (item 1 of argv) with title "StandardJS"' -e 'end run' "$notif" 1&>/dev/null; echo $notif)

author: Ricky Reusser
